title: Dozens of Ukrainian POWs killed in missile strike
content:
1. Dozens of Ukrainian POWs killed in missile strike  Reuters
  2. Russia claims 40 Ukrainian POWs killed in strike with US HIMARS, Ukraine decries 'brutal execution'  Fox News
  3. Ukraine denies missile strike on Donbas prison; Wagner fighters given front-line duties, UK says  CNBC
  4. Russia, Ukraine trade blame in prison shelling that apparently killed dozens of Ukrainian POWs  CBS News
  5. Ukraine, Russia trade blame for strike reportedly killing dozens of prisoners of war  NBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
